loadDefaultConfiguration

public void loadDefaultConfiguration()
Overrides:
loadDefaultConfiguration in class Service

setController

public boolean setController(ServoController controller)
Description copied from interface: ServoControl
Attach a servo controller to the servo. The servo and servo controller "should be in the same instance of MRL and this reference to another service should be ok. The servo controller uses this method to pass a reference of itself to the servo, to be used directly.

Specified by:
setController in interface ServoControl

Specified by:
moveTo in interface ServoControl

move

public void move(java.lang.Float amount)
moves the servo in the range -1.0 to 1.0 where in a typical servo -1.0 = 0 0.0 = 90 1.0 = 180 setting the min and max will affect the range where -1.0 will always be the minPos and 1.0 will be maxPos

Specified by:
move in interface ServoControl
Parameters:
amount - - new offset
